Instructions to use the app:


Adding an actor:

	Initially and after a reset, the app requests the user to enter an actor’s name upon which information about the actor will be retrieved from the web and stored in the database.

Navigating the app:

	The navigation menu on the top left of all app screens (activities) will allow the user to navigate through the different activities. 

Viewing the filmography list:

	Click on ‘Filmography’ to access the films list. From there, you can add, edit, delete, or search for films.

Adding to the films list:

	Click on the add (+) button within the Filmography screen to add a new film and enter the film information. At least the film title is required to complete this action.

Editing a record in the films list:

	Click on a film entry and select ‘Edit’ to edit the film information and update the entry.

Deleting a record from the films list:

	Click on a film entry and select ‘Delete’ to remove a film from the list. 

Searching for films in the list:

	Click on the search icon and enter the full or part of the title. You can also search by year or genre upon clicking on the corresponding buttons below the toolbar. The result of your search query will be displayed in a list.

Resetting the database:

	From the menu, click on ‘Reset’; upon confirmation, all the actor and film data will be permanently deleted. A new entry for actor’s name is required after reset.

Exiting the app:

	From the navigation menu, click on ‘Exit’ to close the app.
Are you sure you want to reset? \n This will erase all actor and film data!
